executable.title: Tube to graph mapping
executable.description: Maps tubes into a graph structure using an central Voronoi tessalation
executable.contributor: Stephen R. Aylward, Roland Kwitt, Kitware
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware

string.name: tubeFile
string.description: Input tubes that are supposed to be converted

image.name: voronoiFile
image.label: Central Voronoi tesselation
image.description: Central Voronoi tesselation upon which the mapping is based

file.name: graphFile
file.description: Graph file that is about to be written
